data.text:
@Martinez_Elin @hrw ١٠٠
س
القضاء العراقي متهم بخيانة العراق.
الحكم بالإعدام على اربعة شباب ابرياء في العراق من قبل القضاء المسيس لصالح ايران. تهمتهم كانت فقط المالطبة لوطن بدون فساد او ميليشيات ايرانية. 
#اوقفو_اعدام_شباب_العزيزية
@Martinez_Elin @hrw Kids have been facing these issues across the globe. Future of children is at high stake. Governments should lock horn over this issue .

@Martinez_Elin @hrw Particularly children with special needs. Going back on year in mainstream kids, can be regained with support. One year for a child with Down syndrome, gets them back more than a year in social, academic and behaviour progress. It is sooooo bad.
@Martinez_Elin @hrw The pândemic is only going on ,  in the mind of governments.
